subject: RE: [junit] testing switch statements in method
msgSnippet: ... #4 is a mediocre book on Ant, not at all a good book on XP. See http://tinyurl.com/ngvjv for my review at JavaRanch. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
>> 1. JUnit Recipes, By J.B Raisenberger
>> 2. Pragmatic Unit Testing in Java with JUnit, by Andrew Hunt
>> and David Thomas
>> 3. JUnit in Action, by Vincent Massol
>> 4. Extreme Programming with Ant, by Niemeyer Poteet.
>
> I don't know about #4, but I do recommend the other 3. I strongly
> recommend Feathers' book, as well. I would put it #2.

#4 is a mediocre book on Ant, not at all a good book on XP. See
http://tinyurl.com/ngvjv for my review at JavaRanch.

Cheers, Ilja
